org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.audio

Class OpenIMAJAudioFileDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.util.props.ConfigurableAdapter
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.BaseDataProcessor
        • org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.audio.OpenIMAJAudioFileDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.DataProcessor, edu.cmu.sphinx.util.props.Configurable

    public class OpenIMAJAudioFileDataSource
extends edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.BaseDataProcessor
    A wrapper that allows OpenIMAJ audio objects to be used as input to a Sphinx4 speech recogniser.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.Data getData()
                                     throws edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.DataProcessingException
        Reads data from the OpenIMAJ stream and creates Data packets for Sphinx. Creates a DataStartSignal and DataEndSignal at the beginning and end of the stream.
        Specified by:
        getData in interface edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.DataProcessor
        Specified by:
        getData in class edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.BaseDataProcessor
        Throws:
        edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.DataProcessingException
        See Also:
        edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util.AudioFileDataSource#getData()

      • setAudioFile

        public void setAudioFile(URL url)
        Set the audio file to read. Will instantiate a XuggleAudio to stream the data from.
        Parameters:
        url - The audio file location
